releases.details: Part of the Beneath the Surface DVD box set.
special_features: Commentary by Peter Davison, Janet Fielding, Eric Saward, and Mat Irvine
The Depths - Production team and cast recall their experiences
They Came from Beneath the Sea - Featurette on Silurians, Sea Devils, and Myrka
Science in Action - Mat Irvine discusses effects work
Trails and Continuities - BBC1 trailers and continuity announcements
Isolated Music - Score available on separate track
Coming Soon Trailer - The Time Meddler

notes: Beset with numerous production problems and political considerations.
This story marked the return of the Silurians and Sea Devils.
Both Janet Fielding and Peter Davison announced their departure from the show during production.

continuity_notes: The Doctor previously encountered the Silurians and Sea Devils during his third incarnation.

plot.plot_summary: In the year 2084, the TARDIS arrives at Sea Base 4 amidst rising tensions between two global superpowers. The Doctor, Tegan, and Turlough are accused of espionage while a sinister plot emerges involving the prehistoric reptiles, the Silurians and Sea Devils, who seek to reclaim Earth. The plot unfolds over four gripping episodes, filled with sabotage, intrigue, and the threat of nuclear war.
